name: Steep
notes:
Please note: The game runs in offline mode only! Meaning you can't do any challenges or progression.
Black screen unless run windowed.
This installer enables DXVK (with hud) and esync, wine version tkg-3.21.
content:
files:
- uplay: https://ubistatic3-a.akamaihd.net/orbit/launcher_installer/UplayInstaller.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: uplay://launch/3279
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Ubisoft/Ubisoft Game Launcher/Uplay.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Installing Uplay
    executable: uplay
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/My Games/STEEP/Default/STEEP.ini
    key: WindowMode
    section: Display Settings
    value: 0
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/My Documents/My Games/STEEP/Default/STEEP.ini
    key: WindowMaximised
    section: Display Settings
    value: 1
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: devinfo,fps,frametimes
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: '1'
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_SKIP_CLEANUP: '0'
wine:
  ShowCrashDialog: true
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: tkg-3.21-x86_64
